  • Render layer

Render layer¶

The children are drawn to the RenderLayers texture and then the RenderLayer texture is drawn to the WebGL Renderer.

Class inheritance tree of Render Layer¶

  • Import modules

  • Custom class

  • Create instance

  • Children game objects

Import modules¶

import { RenderLayer } from '@phaserjs/phaser/gameobjects';

Custom class¶

class MyRenderLayer extends RenderLayer {
    constructor() {
        supert();
    }

    update(delta, time) {
        super.update(delta, time);
    }
}

Create instance¶

let renderLayer = new RenderLayer();

Children game objects¶

see Game object.
